description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Try this frantic space shooter with eight action packed levels! Fight against tons of enemy hordes and four huge bosses. Destroy the Planetoid before it kills you using two upgradable weapons. Hit the “Target” to transform yourself into a invincible starship fighter. You can collect bonus to rise up your score to the stars or to charge Giga Bombs or again to extend time level.
description.short: Try this frantic space shooter with eight action packed levels! Fight against tons of enemy hordes and four huge bosses. Destroy the Planetoid before it kills you using two upgradable weapons. Hit the “Target” to transform yourself into a invincible starship fighter. You can collect bonus to rise up your score to the stars or to charge Giga Bombs or again to extend time level.
